info.name: External user support
info.summary: Use external user authentication methods like IMAP, SMB, FTP, WebDAV, HTTP BasicAuth, SSH and XMPP
info.description:
Use external user authentication methods to give users acces to your Nextcloud instance: - IMAP - SMB - FTP - WebDAV - HTTP BasicAuth - SSH - XMPP
Read the [documentation](https://github.com/nextcloud/user_external#readme) to learn how to configure it!
info.author: Robin Appelman
